description:

But with Teo's leg still giving him problems, he just could not maintain a position to get fucked AND cum. So Teo fucks the cum out of Sam, then breeds his hole.
Not a lot of cum as he buries it deep, and Sam has so much ass hair that it all just blends in. I think I might have to trim his ass. Don't hate on me!
So what do you guys think? Does Teo have a man-crush on Sam in this video?
title: Sam & Teo - RAW
